title: Seven Yoga Habbits that can Transform your Life: Seven Yoga sins to avoid
description: Seven Yoga Habits is the first real breakthrough for using yoga on unlocking creative potential for enlightened living , and where Sri Joydip applied the insights of timeless wisdom of "Yoga literature" in forming Yoga habits for unlocking creative potential to address daily problems of people , for coping with work and life stress and living a balanced life.There cannot be better time , then doing this now , as the stress level of people has exponentially increased due to pressure from different fronts of life from work , relationships , family , and life in general.Seven Yoga habits that can transform your life showsHow to practice the yoga way of enlightened living.What is the connection between practicing yoga in mat and bringing it to life ?How to manage stress from inner resources ?How to unlock and rediscover your creative potential and transform your life?
author: Sri Joydip
